casebody.data:
Wagoner, Appellant, v. Gerbl, Appellee.

[Cite as Wagoner v. Gerbl, 98 Ohio St.3d 290, 2003-Ohio-739.]

(No. 2002-1661 Submitted January 7, 2003 Decided March 5, 2003.) Mary Lou Kusel, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is allowed.

{¶ 2} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the cause is remanded to the trial court on the authority of Kimble v. Kimble, 97 Ohio St.3d 424, 2002-Ohio-6667, 780 N.E.2d 273.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, Pfeifer, Cook, Lundberg Stratton and O’Connor, JJ., concur. F.E. Sweeney, J., dissents and would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.
